mapper.select: SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='수입' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_date=#{cashDate}),0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(cash_price) FROM cash WHERE cash_kind='지출' AND member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_date=#{cashDate}),0) FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( cash_kind, category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo, member_id, cash_date ) VALUES( #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo}, #{memberId}, curdate() )
